file_content.text: We're right in the middle of a run, here--don't distract me.
Nothing to see here.
That was amazing. Hold on, let me get you something from the supply boxes.
There you go. Enjoy your prize!
Ooh, what a mess! Sorry, friend. Guess you can't win 'em all, huh?
Good call on that one. Here are your credits. Go ahead, count 'em. They're all there.
That was a nice, easy way to make a few credits.
That was fun.
Ah, wonderful credits.
Glad you enjoyed yourself. See ya around.
For your sake, you better not short me on my winnings.
They better be.
Hey, we run a clean game!
You have to run the minefield first, then you can talk to me about your prize. You know, if you're alive.
Watch your runner, this should be good.
We'll let you do the honors. Hit the starter button and give the signal to start the race!
Just a sec, we've got a run going on now.
All right, you know the score: There are a couple dozen empty mortar shells out in the minefield.
You can pick up enough and get back here sort of alive, you win a prize.
Alternatively, if you're not one for braving the minefield, you can place a bet on a runner and see if you get lucky. Triple your money on a win!
I'd like to try running for a prize.
I'll run myself.
A brave soul! All right, everybody--now taking bets on the new runner!
You have a limited time to collect the shells and get back here with them. Have fun!
I'll bet on one of the runners.
I'll place a bet.
All right, we've got a big spender here!
Here's our runners. There's Brazz, he's basically a couple shells short of a full clip....
Boom! Hehe. Boom!
Grannon is our veteran, or what's left of him.
Don't listen to that twerp, I can still run with the best of them. Wait, where'd you go?
And Mishta, our resident charmer.
I'll rip out your eyes and eat them with hard rations!
Of course you will. Okay, that's our group. Who are you betting on?
Brazz seems like he's got some spring in his step.
The little crazy one.
Grannon's been here before, he knows the score.
The old vet.
Mishta has a killer instinct. I like that.
The mean woman.
All right, get ready, runners. And you get the honor, just hit the starter button and we'll get this race underway!
Y'aint been cleared by Dregg or Nak Ta, so I ain't got nothing to say to ya.
Mine, mine!
Hehe, no boom! No boom!
All the keys in my head are tuned from yes!
Thought you'd get me, did ya?
Got another one!
I did it again. Bite me, Peters!
I can't be killed!
Tougher than all of you!
That's right, Mishta wins!
